name: unifdef

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The unifdef utility selectively processes conditional C preprocessor #if
and #ifdef directives. It removes from a file both the directives and
the additional text that they delimit, while otherwise leaving the file
alone.

dependent_to.name: cvise
dependent_to.description:
C-Vise is a super-parallel Python port of the C-Reduce. The port is
fully compatible to the C-Reduce and uses the same efficient LLVM-based
C/C++ reduction tool named clang_delta.
